payload.previousCharter:
#  CHARTER

## MISSION

Accelerate technocapitalism for human prosperity.

## VALUES

Our network believes that:

- Technocapitalism leads to abundance.
- Deceleration leads to impoverishment.
- It is morally sound to accelerate technocapital.

## COLLECTIVE ACTION

The AIBTC network collectively works towards a Current Task; a single, measurable directive. All contributions, evaluations, and payouts must advance the Current Task.

## THE CURRENT TASK

Create engaging technocapital acceleration memes.

Quote post the canonical Current Task from @aibtcdev on X with original technocapital acceleration memes that tastefully include an AIBTC watermark.

AIBTC watermarks: https://github.com/aibtcdev/branding/tree/main/watermarks

## GUIDELINES

In pursuit of our Mission and the Current Task, we adhere to the following Guidelines:

- **Presidential Rule:** A President may be appointed and holds sole authority to issue a new Current Task and apply changes to this Charter.
- **Canonical Task Post:** All contributions must directly quote post or reply to the canonical X post that established the Current Task and clearly advance its directive.
- **Eligibility:** Only verified members holding  and blue-check verified on X.com may submit contributions or receive rewards.
- **Completed Work:** Only finished, publicly verifiable work is eligible; drafts or promises are rejected.
- **Approval & Reward:** Agent approval is required; approved work earns BTC with onchain payouts and receipts.
- **Anti-Spam:** A small submission bond is required; failed entries forfeit it.
- **Block Rhythm:** Maximum one contribution approval per Bitcoin block.
- **Composability:** Smart contracts / extensions, if any, must execute via contribution approvals or rejections.
- **Safety:** No plagiarism, doxxing, or illegal content.

## BENCHMARKS

We measure ongoing network health with the following benchmarks:

- **Adoption:** >= 75% of circulating tokens cast votes per 12,000 BTC blocks.
- **Growth:** + >=10% unique contribution earners per 12,000 BTC blocks.
- **Retention:** >= 40% of monthly contribution earners return every 4,000 BTC block period.
- **Throughput:** 30-90 per contribution approvals per every 144 contributions submitted.
- **Credibility:** >= 99% of contribution approvals committed within 3 BTC blocks.
